survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Plant-Based Dairy Alternatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, purchasing behaviors, and perceptions regarding plant-based dairy alternatives.

questions.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based dairy alternatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure the options cover all typical consumption frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based dairy alternatives?

questions.question_text: Which plant-based dairy alternatives do you consume? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', 'Once a week', or 'A few times a month' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specificity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which plant-based dairy alternatives do you consume? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', 'Once a week', or 'A few times a month' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What factors influence your decision to purchase plant-based dairy alternatives? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', 'Once a week', or 'A few times a month' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format with a limit of 3 selections. Include an 'Other' option for flexibility.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes with max 3 selections). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors influence your decision to purchase plant-based dairy alternatives? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', 'Once a week', or 'A few times a month' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in plant-based dairy alternatives?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', 'Once a week', or 'A few times a month' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in plant-based dairy alternatives?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', 'Once a week', or 'A few times a month' in Q1.

questions.question_text: If you rarely or never consume plant-based dairy alternatives, what is the primary reason?
answer_options: Prefer the taste of traditional dairy
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Rarely or never' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format. Include an 'Other' option for additional reasons.
